Reviews.Title: A SERIOUS PHOTOGRAPHERS POCKET CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: JOSH "J"
Reviews.Content: I have never believed that i can actually use a point and shoot camera to shoot weddings etc!,but let me tell you, if you are looking for the perfect camera that gives you everything you need to relive your Memories in an unbelievable crystel clear way ,then you better get the Panasonic Dmc Zs20!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera - compact in size and beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: LDF
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera after reading a lot of reviews on Amazon and on CNet about cameras that were small but versatile and included a zoom lens. We have been having a lot of fun trying the different features, and we are very pleased with the quality of the photos. One thing I will note is that I didn't realize that the camera has a built-in memory card. I purchased a memory card that wasn't really necessary, but I probably overlooked this in the description of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix ZS20
Reviews.Author: Kevin Gold
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera. The best part is the cool touch screen. The pictures are so clear. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Melanie Stuart
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera, the zoom is amazing. It takes awesome photos too. I highly recommend this camera. It is slighter larger and heavier than most "pocket" size cameras, but is still very compact and can fit in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Good results, excellent pictures.
Reviews.Author: C. Waskiewicz
Reviews.Content: The camera is performing as expected. Picture quality is great, even in low light. Very satisfied with all features used so far.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Manley
Reviews.Content: Not being a photo professional, this camera is easy to use and takes fantastic pictures in low light and at high speed.  Just what I was looking for.  One of the best spec'd cameras in its price range.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera.
Reviews.Author: Polar Whiz
Reviews.Content: I also own a Lumix Z10 which has been a great camera for me.  This camera will replace a Nikon Coolpix 9100SX which has given me a lot of trouble especially with the focusing system.

Reviews.Title: Use of Panasonic Lumix ZS20
Reviews.Author: the S Man
Reviews.Content: Panasonic Lumix ZS20 works fine for my need; it is simple and quick. I use it to analyze the technical running of athletes.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Carol H. Stribling
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the ordinary photographer.  I like its size and its clarity and quality of picture.  It is very user friendly and is convenient to tuck into a purse or lightweight to hang around your neck on a lanyard.  Very good choice.

Reviews.Title: It's okey for me
Reviews.Author: ugur yildirim
Reviews.Content: Picture quality 3/53D Picture 1/5Ergonomy 4/5Body Quality 4/5Video 4/5- USB Cable too short.Anyway, Panasonic Lumix ZS20 is good choice.

Reviews.Title: Dark spot on every picture after 5 months
Reviews.Author: K. Henke
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas and loved it for the 5 months that it worked.  Now there is a dark spot on every single picture.  It's on the middle left so it is not an area that you could easily edit out.  There are other reviews of this camera (listed without the cloths)and there is another person with this exact same problem.  I looked into sending it in for repairs but that starts at $160.  And it appears that Panasonic does not honor its warranty. I have taken very good care of this camera and I know I did nothing to cause this.  I feel bad that I put this on my Christmas list and my husband spent so much money on a rotten product.

ProductInfo.Features:
24mm Ultra Wide Angle LEICA DC Lens with 20x Optical Zoom
Full HD video recording with stereo microphone
0.1sec Light Speed AF
12MB built-in memory
Supports SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
